mapper.sql: id, user_id, account_no, account_name, amount, create_time,state
mapper.select:
select
from user_cash_log where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by id desc

select u.login_name as loginName, l.account_no as accountNo, l.account_name as accountName, l.amount, l.create_time as createTime,l.state,l.id,l.user_id as userId from user_cash_log l LEFT JOIN user u on l.user_id=u.id
mapper.insert: insert into user_cash_log (id, user_id, cash_way, account_no, account_name, amount, fee,invite_id,state, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cashWay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{inviteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

mapper.update:
update user_cash_log
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cash_way = #{cashWay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
account_no = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_cash_log
cash_way = #{cashWay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
account_no = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_cash_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cash_way = #{cashWay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, account_no = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(1) from user_cash_log where invite_id = #{inviteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
